DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The aim study evaluate direct removal urine catheter laparoscopic hysterectomy ( total laparoscopic hysterectomy laparoscopic supracervical hysterectomy ) associate similar ( well ) outcome compare delayed catheter removal surgery , current treatment . In addition , want investigate patient 's experience subject . Study design : Randomized Controlled trial , non-inferiority study . Study population : Women old 18 year old , laparoscopic hysterectomy benign indication low-grade malignancy . Intervention : - Group A ( treatment group ) : patient group catheter directly remove OR LH . - Group B ( control group ) : patient control group catheter remove accord regular protocol hospital ( least 6 hour place ) .
DOC.brief_title: When Best Moment Remove Urinary Catheter After Laparoscopic Hysterectomy ?
DOC.criteria: Older 18 year Scheduled LH benign indication lowgrade malignancy ( without salpingooophorectomy ) Concomitant procedures prolapse surgery , severe endometrioses and/or bowel resection Preoperative know urinary voiding problem ( incontinence ) Preoperative know urinary tract infection Patients suffer disease potentially associate inability void ( e.g . MS ) A Gravid postpartum hysterectomy
